preqs: Successful completion of EDF5720 and an Australian Psychology Accreditation Council (APAC) accredited four-year sequence in psychology

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {3232, 3736, D6007} Do true Otherwise Permission required
Must have enrolled in an (I/W) unit in {EDF5720}

unitName: Clinical interventions in educational and developmental psychology
description: This unit is concerned with developing a sound evidence-based understanding of, and the skills required for working with, individuals and therapeutic groups across the lifespan on the identification, intervention and treatment of psychological problems and psychopathology incorporating an educational and developmental perspective. Ethical, legal issues and case management issues, e.g. keeping records, are considered. The unit develops participants' understanding and skills in clinical interventions in relation to a broad range of child, adolescent and adult problems and psychopathology.
